entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 10:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
